bibl.title: Slave Prices in Late Antiquity (and in the Very Long Term).
bibl.note: Introduction: Problems and Prospects. - What Does a Price Mean? - Price Observations from Late Anqtiuity [P1 - P36, including several papyri]. - Interpreting the Data. - Conclusions: Periodizing Slave Prices in the Very Long Term.
bibl.seg: HARPER Kyle, Slave Prices in Late Antiquity (and in the Very Long Term).

Introduction: Problems and Prospects. - What Does a Price Mean? - Price Observations from Late Anqtiuity [P1 - P36, including several papyri]. - Interpreting the Data. - Conclusions: Periodizing Slave Prices in the Very Long Term.
